title: Silver Rises to Record Above $80 in Historic End-of-Year Rally
description: Silver climbed to a record, pushing beyond $80 an ounce for the first time to extend a historic end-of-year rally.
content: Silver climbed to a record, pushing beyond $80 an ounce for the first time to extend a historic end-of-year rally.
